entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023
